data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Kinshasa.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kinshasa, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 164,900 people living in the state of Kinshasa.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kinshasa
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kinshasa you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.focus_label: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
